ComicInfo.Summary:
Two Allied commandos have discovered the greatest secret of WWII - Adolf Hitler faked his death and is preparing to rebuild his forces and start his war again. The problem is no one believes them. Convinced that Hitler is still somewhere in Europe it's a race against time to stop the Fuhrer before he can join his loyalists in South America.
Note: The digital edition (12/13/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
